name: The Sparkling Farce - Base Game
author: Sparkling Farce Team
description: Reference implementation and base content for The Sparkling Farce tactical RPG platform. Demonstrates proper mod structure for tilesets, maps, triggers, characters, classes, items, and battles. Placeholder art should be replaced with final assets.

example_overrides.art/tilesets/placeholder/*.png: Replace with your own tileset art (16x16 tiles)
example_overrides.tilesets/*.tres: Create your own TileSet resources or use these as base
example_overrides.characters/*.tres: Override base characters or add new ones
example_overrides.classes/*.tres: Override base classes or add new ones
